author: Rosie
install_msg: Thank you for installing my cog, if you run into any issues or have any questions, you can find me in the Red servers or DM me @blizzthewolf. You are also free to open an issue on [my repository](https://git.purplepanda.cc/blizz/blizz-cogs) Just load the cog to enable it.
name: Repeater
short: Repeats a word after it's been said 3 times in a row.
description: Repeats a word after it's been said for 3 times in a row in a chain.
